title: Tickets-
body: How long does it usually take for a support member to look at the "Help Tickets"?

replies.body: But I replied my riot person, does it take longer then 40min+ or they just busy?
What if they responded but I sent a reply back, Do i get put on the bottom?
Nope!  Once a specialist is helping you out individually, they're yours for life...of the ticket!

Depends on the volume for the day and where it needs to route.  Delays are usually caused by creating multiple tickets which can lead to confusion or replying to tickets hat haven't been responded to it.  Because it hasn't been assigned to a specialist, replying will drop you to the bottom of the queue.  Did you have a ticket number?  Regardless, I hope that helps!
